Adult.description: Some Rock Pigeons can be all dark, but they lack the Band-tailed's pale band at the tip of the tail, white crescent at the back of the neck, and yellow bill.

Adult/immature.description: Eurasian Collared-Doves are smaller than Band-tailed Pigeons with paler and browner plumage and a long, square-tipped tail. They have a black collar on the back of the neck; Band-tailed has a white crescent.

Adult.description: Mourning Doves are smaller and browner than Band-tailed Pigeons, with a long, pointed tail.

Adult/immature.description: White-winged Doves are smaller and browner than Band-tailed Pigeons with a white stripe in the wing that is visible both in flight and at rest.
